personalInfo.title: Deputy Zonal Head - Sales
personalInfo.summary: MBA graduate from IIM Vizag specializing in Marketing and Strategy. A dynamic brand development expert in driving revenue growth & market expansion. Experienced in optimizing sales funnels, implementing performance marketing strategies, and leading high‑impact campaigns across B2B, B2C & D2C markets.

paragraphs: I am a dynamic brand development expert with extensive experience in driving revenue growth and market expansion across B2B, B2C & D2C markets. My expertise lies in optimizing sales funnels, implementing performance marketing strategies, and leading high-impact campaigns.

Currently serving as Deputy Zonal Head - Sales at K12 TECHNO SERVICES, I have successfully exceeded sales targets by 120% and driven zonal growth by 28Cr. My MBA from IIM Vizag with specialization in Marketing and Strategy has equipped me with the analytical and strategic skills needed to excel in today's competitive market.
